About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a software developer that loves what he does and couldn't imagine doing anything else. I'm an experienced technology professional with a vast knowledge of the most modern programming languages and frameworks. I'm comfortable with software development's full life-cycle, including planning, prototyping, developing, implementing, testing, and deployment. I'm very flexible and eager to work with you and your business to drive positive client engagement, learn new technologies, and deliver exciting innovations.

Apple Inc. | 2007 - 2014

Expert

• Developed on-brand, strategic showcases that drove overall store iPhone sales to a top 10% rank, for multiple years in a row (2009 - 2010/2010 - 2011).

• Developed key system integration in iOS for customer interaction iPads, acting as product displays.

• Test piloted new initiatives and heroed feedback from consumers, leading to successful new store procedures such as Apple’s Personal Setup® experience.

Microsoft | 2011 - 2012

Specialist

• Ran on-site business integration lectures, training hundreds of educators and admins how to implement SharePoint, Excel, Word, OneNote and OneDrive into their server solution.

• Integrated and deployed multiple SharePoint Server solutions for Howell Township Public Schools.

• Regularly diagnosed and helped customers with operating system software related issues.

Saker ShopRites Inc. | 2015 - 2019

Inventory Control Manager

• Managed 100+ people delegating operating tasks, while approving large P.O.’s and auditing internal processes.

• Traveled store to store to train new and upcoming ICM’s on the CGO software used for inventory fulfillment.

• Applied both statistical and probabilistic purchase ordering for in-demand seasons.

Prosper IT Consulting | 2020

Software Developer Intern
Sprint One

• Worked with the development team on a C#, MVC WebApp, for a client owning a local theater.

• Developed custom controller methods passed to razor pages for a new CMS using Entity Framework Data Annotations and Fluent API’s.

• Created custom Razor Pages interlacing HTML, CHTML and JavaScript for dynamic administrator functions.

Sprint Two

• Developed a Django-powered Model, View, Template game collection, and exploration website with fully authenticated user accounts, SSL encryption, and production-level scalability using a Digital Ocean Linux droplet running Gunicorn and NGINX.

• Utilized user aware libraries using Postgres Many-to-Many through tables.

• Coordinated with a team of developers using Azure DevOps in an Agile workflow.

• Harnessed Django’s API libraries to create a search page while parsing relevant JSON data with custom views.

• Built a user dashboard showing account information, email-authenticated password reset, and the ability to update the account credentials with a custom HTML table element.

• Developed, debugged, tested, deployed within two months, start to finish.

• Partook in daily Agile stand-ups using Kanban workflows in Azure DevOps.

Languages: Python, C#, Java, JavaScript, Swift, SQL, T-SQL, PHP, HTML, CSS, XML

Frameworks: Django, Flask, React, MVC, Entity, ASP.NET, jQuery, Node.js, Express, Boostrap

Technologies: Visual Studio, VS Code, PyCharm, IntelliJ, Microsoft SQL Server, SQLite, PostreSQL, NGINX, Gunicorn, DNS, Azure, AWS, Slack, Trello, macOS, Windows, Linux
